Class RegistrationService

java.lang.Object
services.RegistrationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRegistrationService
public class RegistrationService extends Object implements IRegistrationService
Provides services related to the registration process for projects.

This class handles the logic for retrieving registrations for a project, approving and rejecting them, and checking for slot availability.

    • approveRegistration

      public boolean approveRegistration(Registration registration, Manager manager)
      Approves a given registration if the project has available officer slots. Also adds the officer to the project and updates repositories.
      Specified by:
      approveRegistration in interface IRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registration - the registration to approve
      manager - the manager performing the approval
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successfully approved, false otherwise

    • rejectRegistration

      public boolean rejectRegistration(Registration registration, Manager manager)
      Rejects a given registration and updates the repository.
      Specified by:
      rejectRegistration in interface IRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registration - the registration to reject
      manager - the manager performing the rejection
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successfully rejected, false otherwise
